| `imprintLanguage`        | `imprint-language`            | Language of the links in the About & Legal Tab   | `"cn/zh" \| "de/de" \| "global/en" \| "global/es"` | `'global/en'`                 |
| `label`                  | `label`                       | Label of first tab                               | `string`                                           | `'About & legal information'` |
| `show`                   | `show`                        | Internal                                         | `boolean`                                          | `false`                       |
